subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks had no antidote for Yao Ming, who finished with a game-high 36 points, but Coach Isiah Thomas, who was ejected in the fourth quarter, did not go down without a fight.
snippet: The Knicks had no antidote for Yao Ming, who finished with a game-high 36 points, but Coach Isiah Thomas, who was ejected in the fourth quarter, did not go down without a fight.
